name: Toni Braxton
religion: Braxton was raised in a very strict Pentecostal, then semi-strict Methodist home. She seems vaguely Christian today.
politicalViews: Braxton is a Democrat, inasmuch as she supported Obama's presidential campaign.
author: Tom Kershaw

content.text: Toni Braxton was born and raised in Severn, Maryland.

Braxton was raised in a strict Pentecostal home. Her father was a preacher and ruled the roost with a religious iron fist. The Braxton family was not allowed to listen to contemporary music, the girls couldn't wear pants and her parents believed that Hollywood films "promoted witchcraft."

content.sourceTitle: The religion of Toni Braxton, singer
content.text: However, for reasons unbeknownst to this writer, the family suddenly converted to Methodism and drastically eased up on these restrictions.

content.sourceTitle: The religion of Toni Braxton, singer
content.text: It was here that Braxton began her singing career, in the church choir
and Braxton's mother, Evelyn, held a "family choir" with Toni and her siblings.

Now, it seems that Braxton isn't nearly as religious as was her upbringing. And her parents seem OK with it, or just ignorant. Braxton said, referring to her father listening to her song "You're Makin' Me High,"
My dad was like, 'That's a really good beat,' I was so happy he didn't listen to the lyrics.
But something is there, even if it's just a glimmer. Braxton often retweets semi-religious tweets from her fans. Here's the most religious one I could find:
@tonibraxton girl you are killing it in this!! Hallelujah!! Praise God for movies like this!
Though it's not necessarily Braxton being religious, she's clearly not averse to it.
Braxton is a Democrat, at least in the sense that she's an Obama supporter. During the president's 2012 campaign, Braxton tweeted her allegiance with little things like:
Plus, she might be a bit liberal. She expressed a desire to play a lesbian in a film once. No particular reason, it would seem, except she wanted to do the kissing scene?

content.sourceTitle: Toni Braxton Says She's Retiring From Music But Wants To Play A Lesbian On Screen
content.text: I would like to play a lesbian. I don't know why. And do a whole make-out scene and the whole thing: just something completely different than people would expect from me. Not a lipstick lesbian, either.

content.sourceTitle: Toni Braxton Reveals Story Behind Bankruptcy Headlines
content.text: Other than that, Braxton exhibits an almost Republican-like aversion to taxes. She seems to be rather bad with money. Braxton has filed bankruptcy twice,
and in 2009, she was on the hook to the state of California for almost $80,000.
